title: Sky-High Hong Kong Victoria Harbour Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Club Lounge Access
description:
There’s simply no better location in Hong Kong - perfectly positioned on Canton Road, Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel offers spectacular views over the iconic Victoria Harbour waterfront and the city’s spellbinding skyline.

You’ll enjoy unparalleled access to the city’s most extraordinary sights - Tsim Sha Tsui’s luxury shopping malls, Hong Kong Museum of Art and the legendary Star Ferry terminal are within easy walking distance. Return to laidback antipasti and top-notch wines at Cucina or classic Hong Kong high tea in the sophisticated Lobby Lounge.

Ready to explore? Hit the Star Ferry and soak up Hong Kong's ancient temples, raucous nightlife and Victoria Peak’s historic heights, or head further afield to Lantau for secluded beaches and The Big Buddha.

Wherever you end up, you’ll be surrounded by Hong Kong’s rich heritage, dynamite dim sum and countless possibilities. Finish your evening soaking up some of the best views in Hong Kong with exclusive nightly access to the Continental Club for cocktails.
offer_address: Harbour City, 3 Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong

title: Spectacular City Stay with Victoria Harbour Location and Club Access Included
description: Experience the beating heart of Hong Kong with a stay the iconic Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel. This luxurious property overlooks the spectacular Victoria Harbour and its Canton Road location offers easy access to the city’s busiest commercial, shopping and business hub. The Star Ferry and Hong Kong’s cruise terminal are on your doorstep and the hotel forms part of Harbour City, Hong Kong’s largest shopping complex. Access to the exclusive Canton Lounge is included, meaning you will benefit from daily breakfast and afternoon tea, and nightly free-flow drinks including fine wines and chef-crafted canapés. You will also enjoy a late 1pm checkout and a 15% discount on food and beverage across the hotel’s Café Marco and Cucina restaurants and Lobby Lounge bar.
offer_address: 3 Canton Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong

title: Shangri-La Hong Kong Harbourfront Break with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Stay in an unbeatable harbourfront location at Kowloon Shangri-La in Hong Kong, a five-star landmark hotel that boasts a prime spot along the waterfront of Victoria Harbour. When it comes to gastronomic delights, there's no need to search further than the walls of your hotel thanks to four exquisite dining options onsite, including the Michelin-starred Shang Palace, serving a mouthwatering range of Cantonese dishes and equipped with a dedicated wine cellar and a 20-seat grand private dining room. If you're on the go, stop by Baked by Shangri-La for homemade bread and pastries. For a tipple or two, the Lobby Lounge is the perfect spot to relax under crystal chandeliers while live music and an extensive cocktail menu will keep you entertained.

There's always something to do in Kowloon. Whether you're keen to explore the Hong Kong Museum of History, go shopping, laze under a tree at the city park or peruse the stalls at the Temple Street Night Market, the hotel is perfectly placed to tick off all the must-see and must-dos on your list.
offer_address: 64 Mody Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
